abstract: The object that determines which scene handles the quick action.
overview:
## Discussion

UIKit applies the value in this property to the activation conditions defined by the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UISceneActivationConditions] objects of the available scenes. Based on the predicates you specify, UIKit selects the most appropriate scene for handling the action.

# targetContentIdentifier

**Instance Property**

The object that determines which scene handles the quick action.

## Declaration

```swift
var targetContentIdentifier: Any? { get }
```

## Discussion

UIKit applies the value in this property to the activation conditions defined by the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UISceneActivationConditions] objects of the available scenes. Based on the predicates you specify, UIKit selects the most appropriate scene for handling the action.
title: targetContentIdentifier
